pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Statistical Methods // A toolbox of common robust statistical tests, including robust descriptives, robust t-tests, and robust ANOVA. It is also available as a module for 'jamovi' (see https://www.jamovi.org for more information). Walrus is based on the WRS2 package by Patrick Mair, which is in turn based on the scripts and work of Rand Wilcox. These analyses are described in depth in the book 'Introduction to Robust Estimation Hypothesis Testing'.
